name: Suzuki Alstare Extreme Racing
description: Join Team Suzuki Alstare for the fastest race of your life! Race wicked-fast bikes in the great outdoors. Customize the official Team bikes Suzuki Alstare SuperBike GSX-R750 and Suzuki Alstare SportBike GSX-R600. Fast-paced motorcycle racing at 60 Frames Per Second. Cutting Edge 3D graphics. Race on 12 Diverse tracks and then try them in Reverse Mode. 4 game modes including 2 player split-screen.
